remarks: The integers are an Abelian group under addition.  Note:  This theorem has hard-coded structure indices for demonstration purposes.  It is not intended for general use.  Use ~ zsubrg instead. (New usage is discouraged.)  (Contributed by NM, 4-Sep-2011.)
statement:
zaddablx.g $e |- G = { <. 1 , ZZ >. , <. 2 , + >. } $.
zaddablx $p |- G e. Abel $.
